title: 3.1.1 Final - java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Class java.util.UUID[] is instantiated reflectively but was never registered

labels.name: triage/upstream
labels.description: Used for issues which are caused by issues in upstream projects/dependency

body:
### Describe the bug


Upgrading from 3.1.0 Final to 3.1.1 Final leads to this is native mode only

